analysis.key_quote: You will end up removing people who are trying to implement the policies of the executive, not removing the ones who resist them (and just resist doing work in general) and play games like filing complaints against managers who add trying to implement change directed by the President and Administration.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule will not effectively address low performers and will instead target those who support executive policies, indicating a fear of politicization and undermining of merit-based evaluations.
